object.name: setStickerPositionInSet
object.description: Use this method to move a sticker in a set created by the bot to a specific position. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Use this method to move a sticker in a set created by the bot to a specific position. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Use this method to move a sticker in a set created by the bot to a specific position. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: New sticker position in the set, zero-based
annotations.html_description: New sticker position in the set, zero-based
annotations.rst_description: New sticker position in the set, zero-based
annotations.name: position
